nodes.text: An Oi-oi Puff was a dessert served at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo at Black Spire Outpost on Batuu. It was a pastry that included oi-oi and other fruits in its filling and topping. The pastry was topped with a small chocolate disc depicting the Black Spire Outpost emblem.

Oi-oi puffs are found in the real world as a dessert item at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Disneyland's Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The menu's description reads, "Raspberry cream puff, passion fruit mousse." The dessert also includes a small chocolate coin.
